name: earby
description: A web application to aid musicians in learning music by ear.

scripts.build:tbs: cd node_modules/bootstrap && npm install -g grunt-cli && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.build:js: mkdir dist/ && mkdir dist/js/ && uglifyjs js/*.js > dist/js/earbyapp.min.js
scripts.build:cp-src: cp index.htm dist/index.htm && cp -R templates/ dist/templates/ && cp -R custom-styles/ node_modules/bootstrap/less/
scripts.build:cp-scripts: cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js dist/js/bootstrap.min.js && cp node_modules/mustache/mustache.min.js dist/js/mustache.min.js && cp node_modules/underscore/underscore-min.js dist/js/underscore-min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:tbs && npm run build:js && npm run build:cp-src && npm run build:compile-tbs && npm run build:cp-scripts && npm run build:cp-css && npm run build:cp-fonts
